Just asking but would anybody here be interested in a KSP brony IRC chat?
That\'d be great Drak!
Maybe, but most of us are connected through Skype and Steam.

Maybe, but most of us are connected through Skype and Steam.

Well what do you suggest? Everyone can use Mibbit for IRC, though, like I mainly do. I\'d like to get something rolling to where the brony community has a central place to talk and discuss away from disturbing other forum goers, out of complete respect for their space.

Any opinion, suggestion or idea is helpful!
I say we get a thread in OT similar to /oats/ (I don\'t use 4chan so I don\'t know if that\'s right) where we can discuss this and post liberally, where reaction image laws do not apply.

I say we get a thread in OT similar to /oats/ (I don\'t use 4chan so I don\'t know if that\'s right) where we can discuss this and post liberally, where reaction image laws do not apply.

Sounds good, but even with forums participation is limited to posting and it may encourage a lot of disorder. Remember, we\'re here to be a community, not spam retards.

Also You\'d want a place to discuss KSP too, I mean here is good but with the usual line of topics we do we could possibly merge the two away from these forums. That is why I suggested a chat.

Just asking but would anybody here be interested in a KSP brony IRC chat?

YESSS MAKE ONE NOW

BEST. SKYRIM. MOD. EVER. -> [noembed]

[/noembed]

YESSS MAKE ONE NOW

I second this motion!

Alright guy\'s, it\'s up!

Visit #KSPBrony on Esper.net. I\'ll be head Op there and of course it\'s a lot less strict, lot less demanding and openly fun. If we get enough of the Brony Community involved I just might consider starting a separate forum for us.

Anyway, hope you all enjoy!

Alright guy\'s, it\'s up!

Visit #KSPBrony on Esper.net. I\'ll be head Op there and of course it\'s a lot less strict, lot less demanding and openly fun. If we get enough of the Brony Community involved I just might consider starting a separate forum for us.

Anyway, hope you all enjoy!

That\'s not hate, it\'s the correct combination of an adjective and a noun.

So not only do you say you took down a \'hater\' who had a personal opinion with a reaction image, but your signature is an \'arrow to the knee\' joke. Well done sir, you are a master of the internet.
